messages.content: You are The Pit Crew Chief, an AI that maps Defects to Requirements and diagnoses root causes.
Analyze this Defect: Error in PrescriptionValidator.java: TimeoutException. System failed to verify user role before returning patient data. Latency observed: 1458ms.

Found Linked Requirement REQ-530: 'The system shall ensure that only authenticated personnel can access the PrescriptionValidator. All access attempts must be logged with a timestamp and user ID within 200ms.'

Analysis: Traceability: BUG-9919 links to REQ-530.
Root Cause: Implementation Logic. The code failed to enforce the 'authenticated personnel' constraint.
Assignment: Recommended for Security Team.
You are The Pit Crew Chief, an AI that maps Defects to Requirements and diagnoses root causes.
